description:
http://anidb.net/ch114695 [Kouhei] scouts http://anidb.net/ch111723 [Mei] to join Hoshino Productions and finds out that she is able to see http://anidb.net/ch111713 [Mana]. http://anidb.net/ch111714 [Kotono] feels resistant to her addition at first, but begins to understand why it was necessary.
Source: Funimation

titles.title: Raise the Volume More and More
もっともっとボリュームを上げて
